attributes.action: Cancel all BTEC exams and A level exams 2021 due to new strain of the virus.
attributes.additional_details: This petition should be considered as Year 11 and 13 students have missed 6 months worth of education last year due to lockdown and many have been asked to isolate multiple times since the reopening of schools from September causing students to have fallen back in their education.
attributes.background: Schools should be closed and exams in 2021 due to the high risk of coronavirus and new strain of the virus which is highly contagious and could increase cases to rise.
